name: keep-try
description: try to do a chain of somethings until one success

scripts.dev: npm run test; chokidar *.js -c "standard *.js && tape -r @babel/register test.js | tap-spec"
scripts.build-browser: parcel build index.js -t browser --no-minify --global keepTry -o keep-try.browser.js
scripts.build-browser-min: parcel build index.js -t browser --global keepTry -o keep-try.browser.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-browser && npm run build-browser-min
